project1.title: Not The Office Again
project1.description: NSS E12 Front End Capstone. Created a React app for those of us addicted to The Office. Discover new content featuring your favorite characters.

project2.title: Bozo University
project2.description: Group Project to create admin panel for clown college. Thanks Michael, Nick, and Nate. I was responsible for the landing page and classes page.

project3.title: Pinterest
project3.description: Our first CRUD app using Firebase and Google authentication. Log in with a google account and create boards and pins of your favorite things!

project4.title: Tamagotchi
project4.description: Tamagotchi was our first time using webpack and SCSS. The objective was to create an app inspired by the popular 90s game. Go play. Eat healthy.

project5.title: Bear Watcher
project5.description: Bear Watcher was our introduction to ES6 Modules. The objective was to create a page that took user input and tracked bears. Go catch a fish!
